turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order a caffè mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that sounds like a great drink. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Fort Gratiot on 24th Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said you want 1 iced venti cafe mocha from starbucks on 24th avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct, and no, that will be it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total for the order. should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the drink will be ready in 10 mins. the receipt has been sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there any other way i can help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, awesome. And no, that'll be it. Thank you.
